snippet.title: EbiTapes - Official Trailer | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Dive into the hand-drawn world of EbiTapes in this trailer for the upcoming quirky adventure game. The trailer showcases gameplay and EbiTales' colorful world for this game where you set off on a cozy-grunge jam journey on a mission to save the Annual City Festival. EbiTapes will be available in 2025.
